lines.line: Give me a quest!
Give me a quest what?
Give me a quest please.
Well seeing as you asked nicely... I could do with some help.
The wizard Grayzag next door decided he didn't like me so he enlisted an army of hundreds of imps.
These imps stole all sorts of my things. Most of these things I don't really care about, just eggs and balls of string and things.
But they stole my four magical beads. There was a red one, a yellow one, a black one, and a white one.
These imps have now spread out all over the kingdom. Could you get my beads back for me?
Well this is a surprising turn of events!
What?
Well I just so happen to have all of those beads on me!
Are you saying that you stole my beads all this time and I've been blaming these imps!?
No, not at all! I just found them throughout my travels and presumed somebody would need them at some point.
Bah! Fine.
I'll try.
That's great, thank you.
I've better things to do than chase imps.
Well if you're not interested in the quests I have to give you, don't waste my time by asking me for them.
Give me a quest or else!
Or else what? You'll attack me?
Hahaha!
Just stop messing around and give me a quest!
Ah now you're assuming I have one to give.
So how are you doing finding my beads?
I've not found any yet.
Well get on with it. I've lost a white bead, a red bead, a black bead, and a yellow bead. Go kill some imps!
I have found some of your beads.
Come back when you have them all. The colour of the four beads that I need are red, yellow, black, and white. Go chase some imps!
You're a fool. Do you really think you'll find four imps out of thousands? Good luck. Ha!
I've got all four beads. It was hard work I can tell you.
Give them here and I'll check that they really are MY beads, before I give you your reward. You'll like it, it's an amulet of accuracy.

characters.name: Wizard Mizgog
characters.description: Elderly male wizard, British accent, stuttering and somewhat flustered tone. A clumsy but earnest scholar who studies magical trinkets at the Wizards' Tower, often bullied by his rival Grayzag.

characters.name: Wizard Grayzag
characters.description: Middle-aged male wizard, British accent, sinister and mocking tone. A necromancer and master of imps who delights in tormenting his rival Mizgog with petty schemes.
